info.title: Mailbox Service REST API Documentation and Client
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for the Voyent Mailbox Service. It's also a dynamic client that you can use to exercise the API

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account under which one or more realms are managed.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource. In practice, this is generally a username to which the mailbox is assigned

get.summary: Retrieve the contents of a mailbox
get.description: Retrieves the contents of the mailbox identified by the id

200.description: Returns a single, specific record uniquely identified by the resourceId

post.description: Save a specific Mailbox using the provided resourceId as the key.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The resource to be saved.

201.description: Returns the created resource id URI in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

delete.description: Delete a specific Mailbox identified by the resourceId .

204.description: Indicates that the resource was successfully deleted.

put.description: Update a mailboxes content using the provided resourceId as the key. This takes the client version as verbatim

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A copy of the resource to be updated.

201.description: Indicates the Mailboxes content has been updated

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account under which one or more realms are managed

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string for finding a set of mailboxes. Default {} (find all)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit clause for the number of mailboxes to get

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A fields clause for retrieving a certain projection

get.summary: Retrieve a 'info' subresource record associated with the Mailbox
get.description: Retrieves the contents of the 'info' block identified by the query. Info is an optional subresource that may be attached to a Mailbox

200.description: Returns an array of Info records that match the query

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A copy of the resource to be updated.

201.description: Indicates the Mailbox/Info subresource content has been updated

delete.summary: Remove the 'Info' subdocument from the Mailbox resource

204.description: Indicates that the resources were successfully deleted.

get.summary: Retrieve the contents of the Mail subResource
get.description: Retrieves the contents of the Mail subResource of the mailbox identified by the id

200.description: Returns a single, specific Mail record uniquely identified by the resourceId

delete.summary: Remove the Mail subResource from a mailbox
delete.description: Delete a specific Mail subResource from the Mailbox identified by the resourceId

204.description: Indicates that the Mail subResource was successfully deleted

put.description: Update or create a Mail subresource on a mailbox

get.summary: Retrieve the state subResource from the  mailbox
get.description: Retrieve the contents of the mailboxes state record identified by the resourceId

200.description: Returns an array of Mailbox records that match the query

delete.summary: Remove the state subResource from a mailbox
delete.description: Delete the state subResource from the mailbox identified by the resourceId

204.description: Indicates that the resources were successfully deleted.

get.summary: Retrieve the permissions settings for an Mailbox resource
get.description: Retrieve the access permissions block for a Mailbox. Read permission pr is required to read the permissions

200.description: The permission block for the resource

put.description: Update the permission block for the resource. Access requires 'pr' permission to perform

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A copy of the resource to be updated.

204.description: The permission block has been successfully updated

Mailbox.description: Mailbox content may be any valid Javascript Object

MailboxInfo.description: The Info subsection of the Mailbox.

MailboxMail.description: The Mail subsection of the Mailbox.

MailboxState.description: The State subsection of the Mailbox

owner.description: The username of the creator of the resource
The rights defined for the owner of the resource. Any of ['r', 'u', 'd', 'x', 'pr', 'pu']

realm.description: Access rights granted to other users in the same realm. Any of ['r', 'u', 'd', 'x', 'pr', 'pu']

roles.description: A set of access blocks granted to roles defined in the system
